title: Premature babies could benefit from combined glucocorticoid and antioxidant therapy

title_detail.value: Premature babies could benefit from combined glucocorticoid and antioxidant therapy

summary: Scientists have suggested that subtle changes to the drugs administered to mothers threatened with preterm birth or to premature babies could further improve clinical treatment and help increase their safety.

summary_detail.value: Scientists have suggested that subtle changes to the drugs administered to mothers threatened with preterm birth or to premature babies could further improve clinical treatment and help increase their safety.
